mapper.insert: insert into t_everyday_info (id, name, description, pic_url, valid, gmt_create, gmt_modify) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_everyday_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_everyday_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update t_everyday_info set deleteFlag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id in #{item}
